name: Merge Runner
description:
Merge Runner is an Auto Battler where you'll need to merge items to make the hero stronger and survive.

Programming : Lusitano

Art: Shoppai https://shoppai.itch.io/

Music: Lusitano

Sound Effects : Medieval Combat sounds by Cafofo

Font : kongtext

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #14 in three days . It is my second game for online game jams as well as my first collaboration with Shoppai. It is not finished as it is only a prototype of what it can be.

If you like these types of games do comment!

What was your score? Enjoy!
